lead_paragraph: Representing Wales at the European Championship is a welcome change from being on "holiday" during a major international tournament, Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey has said.

headline.print_headline: Euros Are Perfect Holiday Substitute for Wales' Ramsey
headline.main: Euros Are Perfect Holiday Substitute for Wales' Ramsey

snippet: Representing Wales at the European Championship is a welcome change from being on "holiday" during a major international tournament, Arsenal midfielder Aaron Ramsey has said....
